file_content.text: Stop! Stop this, Kai. They have the better of us, and besides, it's not worth it.
Stop! Stop this, Kai. He has the better of us, and besides, it's not worth it.
Stop! Stop this, Kai. She has the better of us, and besides, it's not worth it.
The evidence is already on its way to House Ulgo. He had no intention of giving it to you.
Did you really think you could betray me?
Is this true?
Don't expect me to leave without getting what I came for.
Where's the evidence?
You will all pay for this.
Then you all die.
Sam, you idiot. We could've been counts!
You've lost all sense of honor. Lying and stealing? I swore to live by a code.
The runner with the evidence is delivering it to Ulgo's son, Vessex.
Sam! You'd betray your own brother? I'll kill you for that!
Dammit, Kai. I'm sorry.
Look, the coordinates the runner was headed to are in the console over there. You might be able to catch him if you hurry.
I'll take Kai's assassins. I promise, neither you nor Thul will hear from us again.
We won't be so merciful a second time.
Go rebuild your honor.
I won't forget it. We owe House Thul a big favor. Good luck recovering that evidence.
No one betrays me and lives.
I don't care. [Kill Sam.]
Aaagh!
Well, brother, would you look at this? I wasn't expecting anyone so professional. I guess Thul isn't half as stupid as I thought.
Well, brother, would you look at this? A Sith! I guess Thul isn't half as stupid as I thought.
Well, brother, would you look at this? A bounty hunter! Well, what do you know--Thul isn't half as stupid as I thought.
It won't do them any good, but I give them points for trying. Now if you'd kindly hand over the payment.
Here's your payment, now hand over the evidence.
Take it.
Oh... that was never part of the plan.
I'm not giving you a thing until I'm sure there are no tricks.
Evidence, first.
Tricks? We've only just met, and you already know me so well.
I thought Thul would send some scrawny diplomat I could take hostage, but you, you'll fetch a higher price.
You will have to beat me, first.
I don't think so.
I'm looking forward to it.
I'm going to enjoy kicking your face in.
Beating you will be fun.
Don't get your hopes up. We've been doing this our whole lives.
Hey, no need for violence!
Oh, please, don't try to talk yourself out of this. It'll only end badly.
I think I'd rather just kill you.
You should die. [Attack.]
To arms, men!
I have nothing to say to you right now.
